programme.title: 1995 Shutdown of the federal government
programme.short_synopsis: The United States debt crisis and the shutdown of the federal government in 1995.
programme.medium_synopsis: The federal government shutdown on November 14 1995, the events leading up to this national crisis, and an exploration of the history of US debt and the proposed solutions.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
